meanings.sent1: The unseeing cat bumped into the wall.
meanings.sent2: She walked unseeing through the dark room.
meanings.sent3: The unseeing squirrel mistook a rock for a nut.
meanings.sent4: His unseeing eyes missed the beauty of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The unseeing bat navigated through the cave using echolocation.

meanings.definition: Lacking the ability to see or observe
meanings.sent1: The unseeing child relied on touch to explore the world.
meanings.sent2: The unseeing owl perched silently in the tree.
meanings.sent3: The unseeing robot struggled to distinguish colors.
meanings.sent4: Her unseeing gaze betrayed her confusion.
meanings.sent5: The unseeing mole burrowed underground with ease.

meanings.sent1: The unseeing man relied on his guide dog for assistance.
meanings.sent2: She felt unseeing hands guiding her through the maze.
meanings.sent3: The unseeing bat soared gracefully in the night sky.
meanings.sent4: His unseeing stare made others uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The unseeing artist painted vibrant landscapes from memory.
